mapper.update: UPDATE PAYMENT_HISTORY, PAYMENT SET PH_UID = IFNULL(#{ph_uid}, PH_UID) ,PAY_STATE = IF(PAY_STATE='BEFORE','REQ',PAY_STATE) WHERE PH_IDX = #{ph_idx} and PH_PAY_IDX = PAY_IDX
mapper.select: SELECT PH_IDX, PH_RES FROM ORDERS ,PAYMENT, PAYMENT_HISTORY WHERE O_PAY_IDX= PAY_IDX AND PH_PAY_IDX = PAY_IDX AND PH_FLAG = 1 AND PH_TYPE = #{ph_type} AND O_CODE = #{o_code}
